img_above_text:
![Bishui Cave Walkthrough \(28\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/81/Bishui_Cave_Walkthrough_%2828%29.png)
Go and collect the green Wisp, then slide down the ice-covered path to the left of it. When you get to the bottom, go straight up and then go around the rock on the right, past the statue (back toward the bull guards).
img_below_text:
Drop down and you'll find a chest here, where you can grab Gold Tree Core and Blood of the Iron Bull. Climb back up and now head through the passageway into room, this time covered in ice and lava.
![Bishui Cave Walkthrough \(30\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/cc/Bishui_Cave_Walkthrough_%2830%29.png)
summary_promot:

        - Following Text: "Drop down and you'll find a chest here, where you can grab Gold Tree Core and Blood of the Iron Bull. Climb back up and now head through the passageway into room, this time covered in ice and lava.
![Bishui Cave Walkthrough \(30\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/cc/Bishui_Cave_Walkthrough_%2830%29.png)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.

img_summary: The image depicts a dark cave environment with a statue and dimly lit surroundings, including candles near the statue. The red arrow indicates a path leading to the right, suggesting the next step in the walkthrough. Based on the preceding and following text, the image serves as a visual guide for navigating the Bishui Cave area in *Black Myth: Wukong*, directing players toward the next objective near the bull guards and a chest containing valuable items.
